column4: hi people. I am using the karmic koala version of ubuntu, i have got sound on my acer laptop but the mic isnt working, my audio device: Intel Corporation 82801H (ICH8 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 04)
help me please

hi people. I am using the karmic koala version of ubuntu, i have got sound on my acer laptop but the mic isnt working, it used to work in 9.04 version,  my audio device: Intel Corporation 82801H (ICH8 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 04). please help.
could it be a bug?
what are you using to record or monitor that mic input?  I have an acer laptop with 9.10 on it as well, never tried the mic
please test your mic
trying to think if I have an app that uses microphones
I have skype, but I haven't got my account password handy so I've never tried it
put a fake email for a new account, its fast
put a fake email for a new account, its fast
trying to make a new account, but it's rejecting all the passwords I try.  There's got to be another app that we can use to test audio.
let me think
Did you try your sound recorder?
as an aside, I think skype is broken- this new account signup is rejecting every password I give it, easy ones that it probably should reject, as well as good ones that it certainly shouldn't
Go Apps, multimedia, sound recorder
yup, worked perfectly, no config change required
I saw a rather long and gnarly howto for setting up skype audio on ubuntu when I first installed skype...  but I can't find the link to it now.
from what I saw, it looked like all the config work was within skype, almost like all of skype's default audio settings were wrong for use in karmic
that would help a lot
give it some googling, I bet it'll turn up
